DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective collection of data, aimed at a better knowledge of the use of Synvisc® among the patients with knee osteoarthritis (OA) since at least three years.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Follow-up Study of Synvisc® in Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Patients with knee osteoarthritis using Synvisc® since at least three years
